content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Area (Position 0,0 to 4,4)
Consists of three stone furnaces:
- Stone furnace at position (0,0)
- Stone furnace at position (2,0)
- Stone furnace at position (4,4)
All furnaces are currently idle with no ingredients but have coal fuel

### Electronic Circuit Production Line (Position 6.5,11.5 to 12.5,11.5)
Assembly line consisting of:
- Input wooden chest at position (6.5,11.5)
- Burner inserter at position (7.5,11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine 1 at position (9.5,11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position (11.5,11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest at position (12.5,11.5) containing 802 electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (Position -9.5,24.5 to -2.5,24.5)
Steam power setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5,24.5)
- Water pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at position (-7.0,24.5) with 8 coal fuel
- Steam pipe network connecting boiler to engine
- Steam engine at position (-2.5,24.5)
- Electric pole network distributing power

### Science Lab System (Position 0.5,28.5 to 0.5,31.5)
Research setup consisting of:
- Lab at position (0.5,28.5)
- Burner inserter at position (0.5,30.5) feeding science packs
- Storage chest at position (0.5,31.5) containing:
  - 865 automation science packs
  - 347 logistic science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Research Technology Prerequisites Missing
- Cannot research technologies without completing required prerequisites first:
  - Battery requires sulfur processing
  - Stack inserter requires advanced electronics
  - Solar energy requires optics
  - Electric engine requires lubricant
  - Logistics 3 requires production science pack
  - Advanced material processing 2 requires chemical science pack
  - Oil processing requires fluid handling

### Already Researched Technologies
- Verify if technology is already researched before attempting to research again:
  - Automation 2
  - Electric energy distribution 1
  - Electronics
  - Logistics 2
  - Advanced material processing

### Resource Insertion Errors
- Verify inventory has required items before attempting insertion:
  - Cannot insert coal when inventory is empty
  - Cannot insert iron ore when inventory is empty
